Re: tomcat users's list
Subject: Re: Using RemoteAddressValve with an Apache mod_proxy_balancer
Many thanks for the patch. It has been applied to trunk and proposed for 6.0.x
creator: markt@apache.org
markt@apache.org
text: Your patch has been applied to 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.21 onwards. Again, many thanks.
